TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RangeValidator extends System.Web.UI.MobileControls.BaseValidator

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")

summary.span: Validates that another control's value falls within an allowable range.

span.span: Validates that another control's value falls within an allowable range.

summary.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 直接或另一個控制項的參考，會提供最小和最大值的範圍。The minimum and maximum values of the range are provided either directly or by reference to another control. 這個類別的行為相同於控制項。This class behaves identically to the control. 根據預設，表單上的控制項引發伺服器送出表單時執行驗證表單上的驗證程式控制項。By default, controls on a form raise validator controls on the form to perform validation when the form is submitted to the server. 若要停用自動驗證，請設定上的屬性至`false`。To disable automatic validation, set the property on the to `false`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來驗證輸入的數值。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to validate a numerical value entered into a . > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).

span.span: The maximum value of the range to validate against.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來驗證輸入的數值控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to validate a numerical value entered into a control. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來驗證輸入的數值控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to validate a numerical value entered into a control. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

value.span: 資料型別，指定如何解譯正在比較的值。

span.span: The data type that specifies how to interpret the values being compared.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在進行比較之前，值隱含地轉換成指定的資料類型。The values are implicitly converted to the specified data type before the comparison is made. 如果資料轉換失敗，資料驗證失敗。If the data conversion fails, data validation fails. 下表包含的定義列舉型別。The following table contains the definitions of the enumerations. |列舉Enumerations|值Value|資料類型Data Type| |------------------|-----------|---------------| |StringString|00|StringString| |整數Integer|11|整數Integer| |DoubleDouble|22|DoubleDouble| |日期Date|33|DateTimeDateTime| |貨幣Currency|44|貨幣Currency|

exception.span: The specified value is not one of the values.

span.span: The specified value is not one of the values.
